languages.text: [Опуститься на колено] "Могу ли я рассчитывать, что в твоем сердце, ослепительная, есть хотя бы толика неравнодушия ко мне? Отвечай, ибо если нет — я застрелюсь немедля!"
[Drop to one knee] "My dazzling one, can I trust that you hold in your heart at least the smallest drop of regard for me?"
languages.original_text: [Опуститься на колено] "Могу ли я рассчитывать, что в твоем сердце, ослепительная, есть хотя бы толика неравнодушия ко мне? Отвечай, ибо если нет — я застрелюсь немедля!"

traits.locale_text: [Drop to one knee] "My dazzling one, can I trust that you hold in your heart at least the smallest drop of regard for me? Answer me, for if not, I will shoot myself!"
[Drop to one knee] "My dazzling one, can I trust that you hold in your heart at least the smallest drop of regard for me? Answer me, for if not, I will shoot myself!"
[Drop to one knee] "My dazzling one, can I trust that you hold in your heart at least the smallest drop of regard for me? Answer me, for if not, I will shoot myself!"
[Drop to one knee] "My dazzling one, can I trust that you hold in your heart at least the smallest drop of regard for me?"

languages.text: [Clavar una rodilla en el suelo] «Oh, resplandeciente belleza, ¿puedo creer que en su corazón hay el más mínimo aprecio por mi persona?».
languages.original_text: [Drop to one knee] "My dazzling one, can I trust that you hold in your heart at least the smallest drop of regard for me?"

traits.locale_text: [Clavar una rodilla en el suelo] «Oh, resplandeciente belleza, ¿puedo creer que en su corazón hay el más mínimo aprecio por mi persona? Conteste, porque si no, ¡me tendré que pegar un tiro!».

languages.text: [单膝跪地]“我耀眼的美人，你心中是否对我有哪怕一点点的牵挂？”
languages.original_text: [Drop to one knee] "My dazzling one, can I trust that you hold in your heart at least the smallest drop of regard for me?"

traits.locale_text: [单膝跪地]“我耀眼的美人，你心中是否对我有哪怕一点点的牵挂？回答我，否则我就开枪自尽！”

languages.text: [膝をつく]「私の美しい人、お前の心の中にほんの一滴でも私への思いが潜んでいると信じてもいいだろうか？」
languages.original_text: [Drop to one knee] "My dazzling one, can I trust that you hold in your heart at least the smallest drop of regard for me?"

traits.locale_text: [膝をつく]「私の美しい人、お前の心の中にほんの一滴でも私への思いが潜んでいると信じてもいいだろうか？」

languages.text: [Mettre un genou en terre] « Ma beauté éclatante, puis-je espérer que vous nourrissiez en votre cœur la moindre bribe d'intérêt pour moi ? »
languages.original_text: [Drop to one knee] "My dazzling one, can I trust that you hold in your heart at least the smallest drop of regard for me?"

traits.locale_text: [Mettre un genou en terre] « Ma beauté éclatante, puis-je espérer que vous nourrissiez en votre cœur la moindre bribe d'intérêt pour moi ? Répondez, ou je m'ôte la vie séance tenante ! »

languages.text: [Dich vor ihr hinknien] "Mein bezauberndes Wesen, darf ich darauf vertrauen, dass Ihr in Eurem Herzen zumindest einen kleinen Funken Empfindung für mich tragt?"
languages.original_text: [Drop to one knee] "My dazzling one, can I trust that you hold in your heart at least the smallest drop of regard for me?"

traits.locale_text: [Dich vor ihr hinknien] "Mein bezauberndes Wesen, darf ich darauf vertrauen, dass Ihr in Eurem Herzen zumindest einen kleinen Funken Empfindung für mich tragt? Antwortet mir, denn wenn dem nicht so ist, erschieße ich mich!"

languages.text: [Tek dizinin üzerine çök] "Büyüleyici hanımefendi, kalbinde benim için küçük bir damla kadar da olsa bir yer olma ihtimali var mıdır?"
languages.original_text: [Drop to one knee] "My dazzling one, can I trust that you hold in your heart at least the smallest drop of regard for me?"

traits.locale_text: [Tek dizinin üzerine çök] "Büyüleyici hanımefendi, kalbinde benim için küçük bir damla boyunda da olsa bir yer olma ihtimali var mı?"
